trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Comanche
There were no other sightings in Comanche on or around February 4th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my mothers house at around 11:30 to midnight i was sitting on the back porch talking to my wife on the cellphone when off in the distance i saw a string of lights that were very bright i was trying to figure out what i was looking at when it moved like nothing ive ever seen i told my wife oh f#$% there is a F%^& ufo in my mommas back yard i threw the phone down and ran inside and told my nephews and mother to come look so they wouldnt think i was crazy when my nephews came outside it was still almost directly above our back yard then it just shut off like a light switch and we saw something shoot through the sky like a shooting star but it was big and then we noticed there were a bunch of planes out. there have been other people see unexplainable things from my moms back yard as well.
Summary: we saw a string of lights over a house then they disapeared and reappeared imediately over us
